original_text: So Joshua fought against the Amalekites. He did what Moses had told him to do. Moses, Aaron and Hur went up to the top of the hill.
korean_text: 여호수아가 모세의 말대로 행하여 아말렉과 싸우고 모세와 아론과 훌은 산 꼭대기에 올라가서

sentences.original_text: So Joshua fought against the Amalekites.
He did what Moses had told him to do.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모세가 그에게 하라고 말한 것을 행했습니다.

sentences.original_text: Moses, Aaron and Hur went up to the top of the hill.
sentences.korean_translation: 모세와 아론과 훌은 언덕 꼭대기로 올라갔습니다.
